pkgmetadata.longdescription: LabPlot is for scientific 2D and 3D data and function plotting. The various display and analysis functions are explained in the handbook (KDE help center). LabPlot also provides a component for easily viewing the project files in Konqueror.

use.flag: Add support for sci-libs/cdf data exchange format
Import and export data from/to MySQL, PostgreSQL etc. via Kexi (app-office/kexi)
